A small stage with a POLE in the centre. Tables fanned out around it. CUT WIRES hang over the stage. THE BAR AREA Is filled with PHOTOS: YOUNG GIRLS in various poses with men, IPTF SOLDIERS. Scrawled in marker: SARAJEVO FIRECRACKER! She turns to the stage. Plugs in one of the wires. A HUZZ of electricity. Tiny sparks fly. She turns, and under the bar sees... A SAFE, SMASHED OPEN. A handful of U.S. bills scattered about. And... PASSPORTS. Romanian, Ukrainian, Polish. All for young girls. She gathers them, surprised, and stuffs them into her file. Her eyes are drawn to a back wall. She stops at a panelled door. And pushes. It opens onto... STEPS: She shines her flashlight up the dark passage... The BEAM of the flashlight finds a DOOR. A glint off metal... At the door handle, a large PADLOCK, smashed open. Kathy darts the beam over the other TWO DOORS... both equipped with PADLOCKS. Smashed. Kathy pushes through the first door into... 61   INT. HIDDEN BACK ROOM - CONTINUOUS                             61 Kathy's flashlight over: Hanging BEDSHEETS separate the room into cubicles. Putrid mattresses. Condoms on the floor. Her eye catches MARKINGS UNDER A MATTRESS. She pulls it away. And sees GIRLS' NAMES scratched into the floor... Under each name, etched in, a list of amounts: 50, 100, 30, 200, 20... Some kind of RECORD. Kathy PULLS back other mattresses. Dust. Some FAMILY PHOTOS. And... a ragged PIECE OF PAPER: Crude drawings of sexual positions. A NUMBER by each one: $20, $30, $50, $100, $200... The amounts correspond exactly with the table on the floor. direction.raw_text: We lost our funding because of those. ...She points at a basket of CONDOMS near the coffee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the U.S. Department of State. They have their rules. I'll do anything to give these girls some protection. But the Department of State thinks "Condoms encourage prostitution." NGOs caught giving them out, no longer receive US funding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But these girls aren't prostitutes. Milena shrugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They don't realize the cycle they start. If there are no condoms in the bars... They pass a ROOM DIVIDER. Seeing... MORE GIRLS. IN THEIR TEENS. All broken. And desperate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...the guys want to find ways of avoiding STDs. AIDS. Their solution? Pay more for virgins... Kathy sees A GIRL sit in a corner. She couldn't be more than TEN YEARS OLD. She sits alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So the traffickers bring more in. Younger and younger. Now it's a global industry. Simple economics. If there is demand, you supply. Milena opens a DOOR, revealing... INSIDE THE ROOM: A VOLUNTEER NURSE sits by Raya's bed. She lies asleep. IN ANOTHER BED: Irka sleeps. Kathy watches. Hushed...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where can they get help?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Try the Global Displacement Agency. They have good medical care, lots of funding. They might take them. Whether they'll keep them or not... I don't know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are the other girls from the Florida bar? Milena looks at her. Blank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The local police were bringing them here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those girls never arrived. 64   EXT. SARAJEVO - MORNING                                        64 UNMHQ stands over the crumbling red roofs of Sarajevo. In the foreground, a CEMETERY packed with crooked wooden crosses. 65   INT. ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICE - UNMHQ - MOMENTS LATER             65 Kathy walks in. Carmen sits behind a desk, piled with files.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, where've you been?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll tell you about it over a drink. Could you just check something for me? I want to get a copy of the monitor's report from a raid on the Florida Bar yesterday. Carmen nods, and clicks on her computer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your job is so exciting. The only thing I get to raid is the fridge. (Reading off the computer)... You sure there was a raid? There's no record here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. That's definitely it. There were six girls removed from the bar and I need to know where they were taken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry. No record of any raid. Kathy thinking. Something's not adding up. 66   INT. CORRIDOR/OFFICE - UNMHQ - MORNING                         66 Kathy walks. MONITORS greet her as she passes. She reaches an OFFICE, and knocks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm looking for Fred Murray? 67   EXT. MINE FIELD - BOSNIAN COUNTRYSIDE - DAY                    67 FIVE local MEN in fatigues scan the field slowly with hand- held minesweepers. One MAN holds up his hand as his device BEEPS. At the edge of the field, Fred Murray blows a whistle. Everybody else STOPS. The man bends down, as all wait... Kathy approaches from the road, behind a fence. Fred smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We meet again! Kathy looks out, suddenly aware of the dangerous situation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it okay for me to be here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure, sure. You're fine here on the gravel. What's going on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just wanted to follow up with you on the raid yesterday. Those girls didn't show up at the Shelter, and I wanted to locate them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, the whole thing was a bit of a mess. Turned out it was a local police mistake. Mix-up with the tip off or something. Thought they had a prostitution bust, but the bar is legit and those girls were just waitresses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Waitresses aren't kept under lock and key. ANOTHER WHISTLE BLOWS. Fred turns to the field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit. Can we go over this later? I got to get in there. Before she can answer, Fred is moving down the field. She watches him go. 68   EXT. WOMEN'S MEDICA SHELTER - DAY                              68 Kathy and Milena lead Raya and Irka out to her SUV. 69   EXT. GLOBAL DISPLACEMENT AGENCY - DAY                          69 A stark contrast, the GDA is a new and shining edifice. Kathy's SUV pulls up front. 70   INT. GLOBAL DISPLACEMENT AGENCY - MOMENTS LATER                70 Kathy and the girls sit in the waiting area. The place is modern, western... corporate. In platinum base relief over the reception desk: GLOBAL DISPLACEMENT AGENCY. The LOBBY. Magazines on a coffee table. The wall adorned with a HUGE FRAMED POSTER of a young girl in a spiderweb. A caption: "TRAFFIKU ZHINOK YE SPRAV. 1999" Kathy scans the hall. Endless posters. 1998, 1997, 1996... LAURA LEVIN, 30s, American, groomed, business-like, comes around the corner. Her ASSISTANT, 20s, leads the girls away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kathy. The new Head of Gender Affairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I heard. Laura Levin. My assistant will take them to the medical center. As soon as they get medical clearance we'll know where we stand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, it's yet to be determined if they'll cooperate with the repatriation program. That's the only way I can allow them to stay at the GDA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're critical... witnesses for a situation I'm... monitoring. I'll need to speak with them when they're ready.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I understand. I'll be in touch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will you be contacting their parents? Laura nods. Something still on Kathy's mind...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The other girls from the raid were supposed to go to the Women's Medica Shelter, but they never showed up. Do you have any idea where else they might have been taken?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't know there were any others. Kathy eyes the girls down the hall. Raya turns, a last look. 71   INT./EXT. UN SUV/GDA - NIGHT                                   71 Kathy starts her car. She pulls out, turning left. Then, cranks the wheel right. 72   EXT. ROAD - NIGHT                                              72 Kathy's UN SUV swerves along the serpentine mountain road. 73   INT. LAURA LEVIN'S OFFICE - GDA - LATER                        73 Laura in her office. HIGH MODERNITY. She works through her files. Opening one with Raya's photo on top. She dials.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 74   INT. RAYA'S APARTMENT - NIGHT                                  74 The phone is ringing. Halyna rushes to it. Out of breath...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mrs. Kochan, I'm calling from the Global Displacement Agency in Sarajevo to confirm you have a daughter named Rayisa?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Straightening) Yes. Yes!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have located her... Halyna falls into a chair, her chest heaving relief. 75   EXT. FLORIDA BAR - NIGHT                                       75 Kathy pulls up to a PARKING LOT full of CARS and UN SUVs. MUSIC spills out. BACK IN BUSINESS. She gets out of the SUV, moving inside... 76   INT. FLORIDA BAR - CONTINUOUS                                  76 Kathy in the doorway. The place is dark but lit by lamps along the walls. MUSIC pumps. The place is hopping. A scantily-clad GIRL dances on the stage, her body writhing but her eyes dead. Along the edges, girls - the very SAME GIRLS Kathy saw released at the raid - 'socialize' with customers. Many of the CUSTOMERS... in IPTF UNIFORMS, others with off- duty IPTF SWEATSHIRTS, and INTERNATIONALS in civilian casuals. A few LOCALS at the bar, where... Tanjo commands the scene, cheery, chatting with an IPTF OFFICER at the bar. Kathy stands, frozen , until she catches the eye of... Luba, sitting on the knee of a MIDDLE-AGED IPTF Officer. Kathy is filled with... anger. 77   INT./EXT. UN SUV - SHORT TIME LATER                            77 Kathy SPEEDS up the mountain roads. Past many bars. One after another, after another... All filled with UN SUVs. Groups of drunk OFFICERS spill out. She stops across from one, seeing: Jan coming out of the bar. Kathy watches, stunned... Jan helps a drunk friend pile into an SUV. He looks up and sees Kathy as a car beam slides over her. She pulls away. 78   INT. KATHY'S APARTMENT - NIGHT                                 78 Kathy stands on the balcony. Taking in the cold air. A KNOCK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kathy, it's Jan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't understand. What's wrong? Kathy stands, quiet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me in. Please. Kathy waits a moment, breathing... 79   INT. KATHY'S APARTMENT - SHORT TIME LATER                      79 Kathy paces as Jan struggles for words.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How can you go up there, when you know what happens to these girls?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was a good-bye party. I was--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're thirteen, fourteen, fifteen--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. If you let me finish, I got a call. Some friends needed a lift home because they got drunk. But hey lady, you better wake up! EVERYWHERE is a brothel. The coffee shop down the street. The post office. My corner store. That's how it is here. I'm not interested, and I try and stay in clean places. And if you don't believe me, then fuck you. He looks at her, hurt - He cares what she thinks. Kathy sees this. Something she hasn't felt in so long... Needed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... I'm not okay. These girls... What are these guys thinking? She looks at him, fighting the urge to trust him. Jan brushes a strand of hair from her face. She lets go. He pulls her in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you tell me what you know?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 80   INT. KATHY'S APARTMENT - LATE NIGHT                            80 Jan and Kathy in front of her computer. They're on an IPTF MESSAGE BOARD: Flashes of Various Posts: New Girl at the Berlin Bar; New Twelve Year-Old Pussy at the Old Grill. They scroll down dozens of posts. Kathy looks at Jan, shaken by the banal malevolence of a boys club gone wild. 81   INT. KATHY'S APARMENT - NIGHT                                  81 Kathy watches Jan, asleep in her bed. 82   EXT. CENTRAL SARAJEVO - MORNING                                82 Fog hangs low over the waking valley of Sarajevo. 83   INT. GDA - MORNING                                             83 A DOCTOR signs off on a final examination of a now much healthier looking Raya. He smiles. She signs a form. 84   INT. LAURA'S OFFICE - GDA BOSNIA - DAY                         84 Laura hovers in the background as Raya dials the phone. Her face raw with emotion. INTERCUT WITH: 85   INT. RAYA'S APARTMENT - KYIV - SAME                            85 The phone in the hall rings. But no one is there to answer. 86   INT. ROMAN AND ZENIA'S APARTMENT - AFTERNOON                   86 Halyna at the door. Zenia pales. O.S. A kettle whistles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roman will be home soon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Make your tea. I'll be quick. KITCHEN - MOMENTS LATER Zenia pours tea out of a chrome kettle. Her hands shake. Halyna stares at a new dishwasher. Then a microwave, blender and small LCD TV. Suspiciously out of context in Kyiv.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roman seems to be doing well.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milk?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need to borrow money. Zenia looks up, unsure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They found Raya in Sarajevo. I want to go and get her. I don't need much. Zenia nods, keeping still as possible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does he still hit you? Zenia chokes on her tea. Conflicted between love and guilt. She wants so badly to say... but she can't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know I hate to ask. But she's my daughter... and your niece. Please--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll get you the money... But you have to go. Roman will be home soon. He won't give it to me if he knows it's for you. 87   INT. RICK JONES' OFFICE - MORNING                             87 Kathy watches Rick flip through her report.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fred Murray. There were other officers too. But the raid was not in the books. These girls were just sent back. They are clearly not waitresses. They are victims. I think IPTF were paid off to turn a blind eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's a serious allegation. And you don't have any evidence. I can't open an investigation based on a hunch. He drops the papers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're gonna need more than this. 88   INT. GDA BOSNIA - AFTERNOON                                   88 Raya and Irka sit across from Laura Levin. She slides a document over to each of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you sign here, you confirm that you are voluntarily entering the repatriation program at the GDA. Raya eyes Irka, confused. Laura softens slightly...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This means we can get you out of Bosnia. Isn't that what you want? Raya's eyes widen. Irka is shocked, but joyous. They never thought this moment would come...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll stay here for two weeks, to continue medical treatment as well as psychological counselling. We'll give you a ticket home and a stipend of $200 to get started when you return. Suddenly Irka's face drops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But... What do I do then? My parents were killed in Kosovo. It was my brother who sold me here... Can't I go somewhere else? Laura fumbles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can only send you home, but what you choose to do after that is up to you. But now, angry tears well in Raya's eyes. She looks up, torn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about the others, the girls in the bar. My friend Luba, we ran, she couldn't... I don't know where she is... I can't go without her. Please... Laura pauses, taken aback.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, but my role here is to get you home. Otherwise you stay in Bosnia, where you... could face charges for illegal prostitution. Raya stares, reeling... To be made to feel like a criminal?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will sign. Raya looks at her, but Irka doesn't look back. 89   INT. KATHY'S OFFICE - UNMHQ - SHORT TIME LATER                 89 Kathy stares out across the central courtyard. Into the adjoining building. Through the glass, she watches... Fred Murray leading NEW RECRUITS through the halls. He jokes around, as the OFFICERS eye him with respect. The PHONE RINGS. Kathy turns. 90   INT. GDA - AFTERNOON                                           90 Kathy stands in disbelief. Laura is stern.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Raya and Irka could be key witnesses in a
direction.name: direction

result.heading: TO THE BACK OF THE COURTROOM

direction.raw_text: investigation. I thought we were all on the same team.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Irka can stay. But I can't keep Raya here. She is refusing to cooperate in the repatriation program.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, just let her stay two weeks. Then we can take it from there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We only house fourteen girls. It's a valuable spot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two weeks. If she's going to testify, she's not safe anywhere else. Laura shrugs, resigned. 91   INT. INTERVIEW ROOM - SHORT TIME LATER                         91 Kathy sits across from Raya. A TRANSLATOR to the side, translates as Raya speaks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We were supposed to work in a hotel. (shaking her head) Now... I can be charged with prostitution?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is another option... I want to help you find your friends. But you need to help me do that. Kathy takes out the photo of Fred Murray and lays it on the table. Raya eyes it, defiant, no reason to trust her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: None of this is your fault. I want to go after the people who hurt you. But I need to know exactly what happens. As a witness in UN custody, you will be protected and will not be charged for any crimes. Raya stares, still not convinced.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... The translator starts. Raya stops her. Frustrated. Turning to Kathy...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: will protect me? They don't protect me when they drink in bar and fuck me and my friends. Kathy is humbled. She looks at Raya, open, raw...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a daughter, just your age... I wouldn't stop until I found her. The two women stare at each other. A silent connection. Raya looks down, almost... ashamed. Struggling to get this out...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I only left because... there was nothing, no jobs, no... chances. I was good in school. But with no money... My mother... She is on her own. She works so hard. But nothing changes. I thought I could help her. He said we would work in a hotel. With good wages... Tears gathering in her eyes... It's terrifying to remember...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But... When we got there... Other girls were there. Like us. From Ukraine, Moldova, Romania, everywhere... We were in the middle of nowhere. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nobody could hear us... They... rape us... One girl go crazy, screaming... He shoots her. He shoots her right in the head. Then we was... sold. Like animal. Raya is stopped by a rush of tears. Kathy reaches for her hand. Looking at this girl, so young... Raya looks Kathy squarely in the face. She slides the photo of Murray toward her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you know this man? Raya nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is not the only one. They come every month. Tanjo give them money, so they don't raid the bar. That day you come... Tanjo did not want to pay. They want to punish him. Take his money. His girls. I ran... Raya sobs, knowing she has betrayed the system. Betting her life on the hope that this system won't betray her. 92   EXT. WOMEN'S MEDICA SHELTER - NIGHT                            92 Milena leads Kathy through the halls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need to get evidence. How many girls do you have here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At least thirty five. MONTAGE: Kathy sits with GIRL after GIRL. Listening to their stories. Writing furiously... Kathy interviews EVA, 16. She talks through grateful tears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Many of them come in. Uniforms like you. Different flags on the shoulders. I will testify. I don't care anymore. One brings cigarette. His name is Peter... Kathy with a different girl, FADILA, 17.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Sometimes if it's a party, a birthday, they pay for a group of girls, all together. Do whatever they want. Brian, the Irish guy, said Bosnia was better than Thailand for girls. Another girl, JASMILA, 18 - stunning, with haunted eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The soldier from Italia say I was his girlfriend. I ask him to help me. But the bar owner pay him off. He has a tattoo of Tiger on his arm. Yet another, NADIA, 14, nodding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Paolo come every week. He had a thin moustache, the other...here I have a picture... Kathy wasn't expecting that. Nadia throws down a photo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He loved the Firecracker. Nadia lifts up her sweatshirt, revealing a long scar. Kathy inspects the photo: Nadia with a SOUTH AMERICAN and U.S. IPTF: Their arms around her. One licks her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They burn me. Then they laugh. Kathy eyes Nadia... Silently in awe of her strength.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you have any more pictures? 93   INT. KATHY'S OFFICE - UNMHQ - DAY                             93 Kathy pins Nadia's photo on a large bulletin board. Steps back. The wall is covered in photos of girls. Kathy reaches for the phone. Dials.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Hello?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Erin. What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's three in the morning, ma... I'm sleeping. Kathy sits back, relieved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mom, are you okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. I just was thinking about you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, can I go back to bed now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Of course, I just... It's great to hear your voice. 94   INT. RICK JONES' OFFICE - UNMHQ - DAY                       94 Kathy stands before Rick's desk. He smiles at her, convivial.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How're things?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Busy. I followed up on the Florida Bar. It's worse than I thought. There was a protection racket. IPTF... Americans, Romanians, were taking pay-offs to make sure the place wasn't busted. That raid was a punishment bust, because the owner stopped paying. But he must've settled it because the girls are right back where they started. Locked up in the hills. Rick scrambles for words, but Kathy's not finished.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I talked to thirty five girls at the Shelter. All this testimony can't be ignored. Our guys are patronizing the bars in large numbers. Rick, serious abuses are taking place. It's all in my reports. Kathy lays her stack of files on the desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, let's back up a second here--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got two girls ready to testify about
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: taking pay-offs--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Testify where?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In court.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bosnian court? Not gonna happen. All International Personnel have immunity. Kathy is stopped.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. But there must be some channel, some exception--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, you've done really good work here. These are serious allegations. Let me look into how to handle it. I'll get back to you. 95   EXT. OLD TOWN - SARAJEVO - EVENING                             95 The markets shut down. The Catholic Church Bells ring. Across the square the Call to Prayer echoes from old loudspeakers`. 96   INT. KITCHEN - KATHY'S APARTMENT - NIGHT                       96 Jan stirs a pan. Kathy awkwardly cuts vegetables beside him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's different for us. We're all military or police. Every contingent except for the U.S... if someone does something wrong, they have to answer to a military tribunal at home. With the Americans... your Dyncorp guys? I don't think you have that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So the Americans aren't legally accountable for anything?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To be honest, I think our superiors would keep it quiet too. I mean, I haven't seen a military tribunal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Jan can't help noticing that Kathy is making a mess of the vegetables. He takes the knife. She walks away, preoccupied.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know my mission stay is up in a few weeks... You could come home with me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To do what? She turns, glass of wine in hand, leaning on the counter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was just... This place, y'know, it gets to you. I'm, I'm worried what will happen to you a year from now. She puts down her glass of wine, irritated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't need to worry about me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone does. She looks at him, seeing... It's not discouragement. It's love.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So Fred Murray could just walk up to a man and shoot him in daylight and he'd never see the inside of a courtroom?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In Bosnia, yes... but... I mean, something that public could get him sent home. And tried in his own country. Kathy gets an idea. 97   EXT. OLYMPIC STADIUM - SARAJEVO - DAY                          97 A crumbling edifice, once home to the world's finest, now a reminder of humanity's worst. INSIDE... Kathy walks with Madeleine, who unleashes Helen the hound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Helen loves it here. I think she has Olympic ambitions. Kathy hands Madeleine the files. She flips through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wanted these girls to testify in a trial against the IPTF officers. But--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The immunity problem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, but if the girls testify in a Bosnian court against their trafficker... Tanjo... they'd have to mention what else goes on in the brothels. Madeleine nods. The dog comes bounding back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It could work. If you make certain that in their testimony they mention every sordid detail of IPTF involvement--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That is their testimony. Then it would be on record. Somebody would have to pay attention. Like...the State Department? Madeleine grins, proud.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're gonna answer for this. 98   INT. BASEMENT - UNMHQ - DAY                                   98 Kathy weaves around the corner of a dimly lit, shabby hallway. She arrives at a doorway: VEHICLE DISPATCH. 99   INT. VEHICLE DISPATCH - UNMHQ - MOMENTS LATER                 99 Kathy talks to LEWIS, 20s, American.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and the two girls have to go to the hospital to get immunized, or they can't stay in the country. I need an armored security vehicle. Lewis looks at her, almost laughing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're lucky you have a car at all. We're stretched to the limit. Besides, isn't this a local police matter? Try them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 100   EXT. LOCAL POLICE STATION - DAY                               100 Kathy parks her SUV. 101   INT. LOCAL POLICE STATION - DAY                               101 Kathy walks into the station, drawing the attention of the LOCAL COPS. Danik rolls his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm looking for-- Danik turns away...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Viko... your American girlfriend is here! Kathy eyes Danik. Viko comes out, smiling broadly at Kathy. 102   EXT. LOCAL POLICE STATION - MOMENTS LATER                     102 Kathy and Viko walk out, energized with a sense of purpose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's no problem. The Van is just sitting here. Let's go. They arrive at a POLICE VAN. Kathy eyes it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not exactly armored, but it will do the trick. You follow me, yes? He jumps in, and starts it up. Kathy follows in her UN SUV. Across the street, a LOCAL MAN watches from INSIDE A CAR. 103   EXT. GDA BOSNIA - EVENING                                     103 Kathy SWERVES up. Viko has the Van parked right up against the door. Kathy jumps out. 104   INT. FOYER - GDA BOSNIA - MOMENTS LATER                       104 Laura leads a very scared Raya out. Kathy smiles, gentle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (at Laura) Where's Irka? Laura takes a deep breath, eyeing Raya...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need to have a word with you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Kathy looks at her watch -- at Raya. Viko taps her shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll take her. Meet us when you're done. As Viko and Raya leave, Kathy stops her...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be right behind you. Are you okay? Raya nods, trusting in Kathy. Who turns, angry, back to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was going to call you. There was a problem. During our repatriation procedures, we realized Irka had no passport.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So we get her one. Where is she?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't get it. She was trafficked from Belgrade. Her parents were killed in Kosovo. And she has no documentation. No embassy will recognize her. She is a girl without a country.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She is a witness for a UN investigation! GDA EMPLOYEES peer. An INTERN betrays a twinge of complicity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We handed her over to the police a few hours ago. I couldn't keep her. I've already done every favour I could for you. This is not on me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You had no right to do that!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had every right. We have a system that works here. You're the one disrupting it. Kathy stares at her. Fuming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where did they take her? Laura shrugs. Shaking off guilt has become a necessary habit. Just then the door opens. And...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HALYNA Walks in. Disoriented, emotion rising...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I... look for Laura Levin?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's me. Kathy holds her anger, smiling respectfully at Halyna. Laura leads her away. Kathy searches for an answer, her eyes landing on... The Intern. Unrelenting...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you know anything, this is on you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think the cops leave them somewhere near the border, so that with no papers, the girls have to cross the border illegally. Take the 103 to Visegrad. 105   INT./EXT. UN SUV - NIGHT                                      105 Kathy. Speeding down the 103. A two-lane winding road. Seeing... Nothing but the 20 feet her headlights show.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 106   INT./ EXT. POLICE VAN/SARAJEVO - SAME                         106 Viko steers the Van around a corner. Raya sits in the back. 107   INT. LAURA LEVIN'S OFFICE - GDA BOSNIA - SAME                 107 Laura hands an excited Halyna a cup of tea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She'll be back in about an hour. 108   INT./EXT. UN SUV - SAME                                       108 Kathy's eyes GLUED on the road, trying to make out a SIGN... LANDMINES. Then another sign... VISEGRAD PRAVO. Sharp Turn. Onto a GRAVEL ROAD. She brakes. SKIDDING. 109   INT. POLICE VAN / EXT. SARAJEVO - SAME                        109 Viko stops at a traffic light. Raya peers out a crack in the van. Seeing... Young WOMEN in the streets. Laughing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 110   INT./EXT. UN SUV - SAME                                       110 Kathy slows her car... FLICKERING LIGHTS. She approaches... A BORDER STATION: A GRAVEL ROAD leads up to it. Kathy slows. BORDER GUARDS smoke and play cards. One guard saunters over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm looking for a girl. She was dropped here a few hours ago. He shrugs, shaking his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you check the border logs? She's about 15, the police brought her here but she didn't have a passport. Maybe--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lady. I know what you're looking for. Those girls do not go through the border. They go through there... He points... A THICK Forest. Stretching for MILES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To Serbia. Kathy stares at the endless forest. A dirt road cuts through the middle. She jumps in her SUV, and HURTLES down the road. 111   INT./EXT. POLICE VAN/SARAJEVO - SAME                          111 Viko turns down a narrow street. He glances in his rear view mirror. An old TRABBANT follows him. He veers down an alley. 112   EXT. FOREST - NIGHT                                           112 Kathy's SUV crawls alongside the FOREST. HIGHBEAMS off the top of the car. SCANNING all around. Then, in a clearing up ahead... A SILHOUETTE. Kathy ACCELERATES. 113   INT./EXT. POLICE VAN ALLEY/SARAJEVO - SAME                    113 Viko eyes the mirror. All clear. Turning onto a DESERTED STREET. 114   EXT. FOREST - NIGHT                                           114 Kathy HURTLES closer to the silhouette...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . She turns. It's Irka. Kathy cranks the wheel, driving off the road and onto... A WIDE FIELD The SUV is jolted by the uneven terrain. Irka peers into the blinding light. Then runs... 115   INT./EXT. POLICE VAN/SARAJEVO - SAME                          115 Viko drives up the deserted street. SUDDENLY two BATTERED MERCEDES fly out from SIDE ROADS and block the way. Viko BRAKES hard. Raya is thrown to the side of the Van. 116   EXT. FOREST - NIGHT                                           116 Kathy stops the car, jumps out, and runs after Irka.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Irka! Irka's legs start to give. Kathy gains on her. 117   INT./EXT. POLICE VAN/SARAJEVO - SAME                          117 Viko REVERSES and TURNS -- but a Mercedes ROARS -- 'round the other side -- BASHING the side of the Van. 118   EXT. FOREST - NIGHT                                           118 Kathy feels Irka slowing down. 119   INT./EXT. POLICE VAN/SARAJEVO - SAME                          119 Two MEN jump out of the cars. With RIFLES. Viko SPEEDS forward. But.. GUNFIRE. Raya SCREAMS. A TIRE BLOWN OUT. The Van SKIDS to a HALT. Viko SMASHES against the window. Raya tries the doors, but they won't open. She wails, SLAMMING herself against the door. Desperate. 120   EXT. FOREST - NIGHT                                           120 Kathy raises her arms, waving... Irka turns. Kathy can see her clearly now, disoriented beyond bearing. Irka shields her face from the distant headlights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Kathy steps out of their glare. And then...Irka recognizes her. She collapses, releasing confused tears. Kathy walks over, careful, slowly bending to help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please... let me die. Kathy holds her. As the young girl cries. 121   INT./EXT. POLICE VAN/SARAJEVO - SAME                          121 The Men approach the Van. Raya's BANGING ECHOES from inside, reverberating around the empty street. Nobody can hear her... 122   EXT. BOSNIAN COUNTRYSIDE - NIGHT                              122 Isolated stars peek through clouds, drifting over dark hills stretching far into the horizon.... 123   INT. KATHY'S OFFICE - UNMHQ - NIGHT                           123 Kathy and Viko sit silent. Barry hangs up the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. We've got a safe house in the mountains. Nobody knows she's here, so we're clear to take her there now. Kathy looks across the room to Irka, who sits hunched, looking out the window. Totally alone. 124   EXT. FARM HOUSE - MOUNTAINS - NIGHT                           124 A MIDDLE AGED COUPLE lead Irka inside a small home. In the MIDDLE OF NOWHERE. Shrouded in the black night. Nobody will find her here. In the doorway, Irka turns to Kathy and Viko.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is Raya? They stare back at her. The woman closes the door. Kathy and Viko stand in the dead silence. His face bruised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go back to the Florida Bar--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think he'd be that stupid?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't care! I have nothing else to go on, do I? Adrenalin overtaking sadness. Viko follows Kathy to the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 125   EXT. FLORIDA BAR - NIGHT                                      125 Kathy and Viko pull up. It's in full swing. 126   INT. FLORIDA BAR - NIGHT                                      126 They step inside, and IN ONE GLANCE, see... THE WHOLE SET OF GIRLS is different. No Luba, No Raya, No Tanjo... The IPTF barely notice her. 127   EXT. FLORIDA BAR - NIGHT                                      127 Kathy steps out. Furious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They moved them already.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck! At the end of her rope. 128   INT. GDA - NIGHT                                              128 Laura, at a total loss, eyes... Halyna. Sitting. Terrified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...How could? No, no, no... my, Raya.... What!? What will they do to her? 129   EXT. MOUNTAIN ROAD - NIGHT                                    129 A BROWN VAN snakes through the distant mountain roads. 130   INT. BROWN VAN - SAME                                         130 IVAN, 40s, drives. Tanjo is in the passenger seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll stop soon. We're far enough now. Ivan nods. Tanjo cranes into the back of the van. He turns on an overhead light, revealing... Five girls. Huddled in the back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you want to testify? All the girls turn to... Raya. Their conscience paralyzed by the need to survive. Terrified, Raya looks to... Luba. Her eyes pleading for support. But Luba turns away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay. We all move to a new bar now. Somewhere no one will come look for you. Then we have a conversation. The girls avoid Raya's gaze. She sobs. Tanjo turns off the light. The van drives off into the unknown. 131   EXT. PARKING LOT - BACK ENTRANCE - UNMHQ - MORNING            131 Kathy stands by her SUV, watching MONITORS set off for the day. Then she sees... Fred Murray emerge with COLLEAGUES, laughing. He stops when He sees Kathy, gazing over, serious. 132   EXT. PARKING LOT - UNMHQ- DAY                                 132 Kathy and Fred walk between the parked cars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's fifteen. I'm begging you--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what you're talking about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you know any of the other bars he owns, anything... I'm appealing to--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey. I'm gonna say this one more time. And you can put this down in your investigation on me. I don't know what you're talking about. He leaves. Kathy stands, a black speck in the patchwork of white UN SUVs spread across the lot. 133   INT. RICK JONES OFFICE - UNMHQ - DAY                          133 Rick's SECRETARY shakes her head at Kathy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've called and paged. He says he can't get into this now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does he know that one of my witnesses was abducted? Where is he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry Kathy, he really didn't tell me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 134   INT. MADELEINE REES' OFFICE - MORNING                        134 MADELEINE It's not your fault. Kathy is downcast. She nods, not totally convinced.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Irka won't testify now. It's completely understandable. She's way too scared. I just... I don't know what to do with her. The GDA won't take her and her traffickers will find her if she's in this city. Emotion taking over...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These girls are dragged into this country like cattle and then the system that's supposed to help them spits them right back out. It barely recognizes sex trafficking as a problem even though it's a fucking epidemic, and everyone knows it. Are we supposed to wait around for that to change?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe it's time for a little diplomacy... Do you have a nice frock? 135   INT. KATHY'S APARMENT - NIGHT                                135 Kathy stands in front of a mirror, in a black dress, her hair hanging down to her shoulders. She stands, awkward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really? You think it's okay? She turns to Jan and Carmen, sitting on her bed. Jan smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're beautiful. But Carmen is tilting her head, doubtful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can stop standing like a farmer's wife for starters. These people are dignitaries. You gotta up your game. She approaches her, and sweeps her hair up into an elegant chignon. She takes off her own earrings and puts them on Kathy. Jan nods, impressed. Kathy eyes herself, pleased.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 136   INT./EXT. CAR/SARAJEVO HILLS - EVENING                        136 A WHITE VOLKSWAGON RABBIT speeds though the Sarajevo hills. Madeleine is elegant in a suit. Kathy looks at her black dress, self-conscious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is there a specific way of addressing the High Commissioner of the Mission?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I call him Bill. Kathy nods, nervous. They pull into a circular drive... 137   EXT. U.S. AMBASSADOR'S RESIDENCE - SHORT TIME LATER           137 The house is incongruous in its context: Manicured gardens, remodelled facade. And tonight its BLACK TIE and CATERING. An elegant WOMAN comes to greet them. She is...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (familiar) Mrs. Ambassador! How do we do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We do what we can. Great to see you Madeleine. Janet smiles with the delicatesse of a diplomatic spouse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hope you don't mind, I've brought along a friend. This is Kathy Bolkovac. Kathy holds out her hand, a little nervous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great. I need as many gal pals as I can get. Look at this place. She gestures toward the room. A haze of cigar smoke hovers over the gaggle of men. Kathy's eyes zero in on Bill Hynes Surrounded by a group of JAPANESE DIPLOMATS. Bill notices her and Madeleine. He waves, familiar. Madeleine nods, humoring. AMBASSADOR JOHN WELLS, 40s, slides his hand on Janet's back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are your thoughts on dinner?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think people are still busy drinking. John shakes Madeleine's hand, darting his eyes over Kathy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Speaking of, what can I get you ladies? Madeleine looks at Kathy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Mr. Ambassador. Ah, I'll have a wine please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (nodding) Coming right up. Madeleine, white for you? Kathy notices the respect he shows her. Janet leads them in, chatting with Madeleine. Kathy surveys the room full of dignitaries. 138   EXT. BACK PATIO - U.S. AMBASSADOR'S RESIDENCE - NIGHT         138 A stunning view of Sarajevo at night. Kathy stands alone. A waiter offers her a convoluted hors d'oeuvre. She takes it, gracious. Trying to figure out what it is when...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice view, no? Kathy turns to... PETER WARD, 40s, smoking a cigarette.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh I... I just needed some air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trust me, I know the feeling. I hate these stuffy events. You never know anyone's agenda. He eyes her. She looks past him... At Bill Hynes. Peter sees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh... well that's a plan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Actually, I had a different one in mind. Madeleine and Janet come through the door. Peter stubs out his cigarette, and moves back inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (arm around Janet) Behind every good man... PATIO - SHORT TIME LATER Janet's eyes betray empathy. She shakes her head, upset.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They just left her there? At the border? Poor girl... Just the psychological trauma. How can I help?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's very vulnerable to re-trafficking. Internationals got her in this situation. We owe her the chance to get out. Janet is keen to follow, but a little lost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We want to repatriate Irka to the United States and find her a foster family. I was hoping you could use your influence-- Janet holds up her hand, nodding emphatically.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're going to find her a home. Kathy eyes Madeleine. Impressed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I also think the American embassy should be aware of some of the problems we're having with our officers. Madeleine interjects...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your help with Irka's case can really raise awareness in the Mission around the issue of trafficking. Madeleine gives her a reassuring glance. Kathy sees the difference between a cop and a diplomat. 139   INT. KATHY'S OFFICE - UNMHQ - NIGHT                        139 Kathy stands. Still in her dress, going through files. Proud of the night's accomplishments, but her eyes linger on the board of girls... On the picture of Raya's APB.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 140   EXT. BOSNIAN COUNTRYSIDE - EARLY MORNING                      140 Sun over the hills. A DOG follows a YOUNG BOY, 5, through a field. The boy stops, seeing a BROWN VAN down the road. He runs, waving as the van approaches. It slows to meet him. In the van... Ivan rolls down the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I come with you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not today. The boy looks down, disappointed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell your mother I'll be home for dinner. Then you and I will go for a walk. I have a present for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it? Ivan shrugs jokingly. Then smiles as he drives away. 141   EXT. BOMBED OUT BUILDING - BOSNIAN COUNTRY HOUSE - MORNING    141 The brown van pulls up. Ivan comes around it, and opens the back door. He reaches in and pulls out... AN OLD BICYCLE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You couldn't buy him a new one? You have money now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll fix this one up this afternoon. I had one like it. Tanjo lights a cigarette, moving to the destroyed building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're downstairs. I want to get them out today. 142   INT. STAIRWELL - BOMBED OUT BUILDING - MOMENTS LATER          142 Ivan follows Tanjo down rickety steps. CRIES AND WHIMPERS GROW LOUDER as they descend into a BASEMENT TWO MEN stand guard. Tanjo walks past them. Opens a door. Ushering Ivan INSIDE where...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . GIRLS are huddled together. Luba, and THREE OTHERS. They look up... PETRIFIED... Offscreen, the cries swell. We realize the sound IS NOT COMING FROM THIS ROOM. Tanjo waves his fingers, methodically...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, let's go. The girls stand, helping one another. Tentative but submissive, they move toward him. He holds open the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to show you what happens when YOU DECIDE TO TALK TO COPS!!!! They jump back. His scream echoes. They move THROUGH THE HALL To a door on the other side. Tanjo nods. A guard opens the door onto A HORRIFIC SITE... Luba closes her eyes. But Tanjo pushes the girls in, one by one they go through into a BARREN ROOM And see... Raya... NAKED. HELD DOWN BY FOUR MEN. SPREAD EAGLE ON HER FRONT. WAILING. HER FACE SHOWS UNIMAGINABLE PAIN. And we see that... Two of the men holding her down are EXTINGUISHING LIT CIGARETTES INTO THE BALLS OF HER FOOT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!!!!!!! But we realize... this is not the greatest cause of her pain. Luba's face whitens. Eyeing one MAN at Raya's backside. A flash of shame in his eyes as he steps away from Raya, and drops... A PIPE onto the ground. The men step away. Leaving Raya. Collapsed into a ball. Now the girls all understand... there is no hope at all. 143   EXT. CONFERENCE ROOM - UNHCR - DAY                            143 Madeleine stands before a small group of REPORTERS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The young woman, who shall remain anonymous, arrived in Bosnia as a victim of sex trafficking and has survived horrific abuse. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ordinarily she would be repatriated to her country of origin. But because she is an orphan, she finds herself without a home. I'm pleased to announce that we have found a foster family in the United States. I want to thank Janet Wells for her assistance in making this happen. I believe this can stand as a signal that the International community in Bosnia and beyond is finally ready to recognize the growing epidemic of sex trafficking, a human rights abuse as abhorrent as the war crimes that drew the International Community to intervene in Bosnia in the first place. Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now that the UN is finally recognizing sex-trafficking, how are you going to monitor it? Reporters flock with questions. Kathy stands in the back, proud. On the other side, Rick Jones watches. 144   EXT. FRONT STEPS - UNHCR - SHORT TIME LATER                   144 Kathy and Madeleine emerge, buzzing with their success.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing on Raya? Kathy shakes her head, saddened.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've sent an APB out to all police stations and UN field offices... But I'm pushing ahead with the other girls in Milena's shelter. I'm creating a photo- line-up using the UN ID database, so they can identify all internationals involved. We've got to make them accountable. 145   INT. CORRIDOR - WOMEN'S MEDICA SHELTER - SHORT TIME LATER     145 Milena looks through a glass window into... 146   INT. INTERVIEW ROOM - WOMEN'S MEDICA SHELTER - EVENING        146 Kathy sits with girls including Fadila, Nadia, Eva... She brings up ID PHOTOS of IPTF officers, scrolling down the page. Fadila points at one and nods, speaking. Kathy writes. Another girl, JASMILA, points at a picture of...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . AN IPTF OFFICER. She nods. Kathy brings up a new page of ID PHOTOS. Flicking through page after page. The girls identify SEVERAL OFFICERS. 147   INT. PERSONNEL - UNMHQ - DAY                                147 Kathy finds Carmen behind a computer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a favour to ask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shoot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have access to all transport vehicle checkouts, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm a fountain of useless knowledge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you see how often Fred Murray has checked out raid vehicles?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fred Murray? Kathy nods. Carmen looks at her, surprised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fred was sent home. Kathy stands back. Confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Why didn't anyone tell me. Is he being disciplined because of my-- Carmen shakes her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's just gone. Meaning investigation over. They wanted him out of here. People are talking. Come on, let's get some lunch. 148   INT. CAFETERIA - UNMHQ - AFTERNOON                          148 Kathy and Carmen at a table in the corner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kath, you gotta be careful. Look, I know you're doing your own thing and all, but you're investigating your colleagues.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've seen what they're doing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. I know. I just, the stuff people are saying, I'm catching snippets, and I'm worried about you. Think about your kids. Kathy is silenced. Then... A TAP ON HER SHOULDER...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looking for you in Human Resources. Carmen eyes Kathy, concerned. Kathy follows the monitor toward the exit. MONITORS and CIVILIANS buzz about, talking. But all around Kathy, the air is silent. Some IPTF OFFICERS eye her, coolly. Is she paranoid? 149   INT. HUMAN RESOURCES OFFICE - UNMHQ - DAY                    149 OFFICER BLAKELY smiles formally. Kathy shifts in her seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm John Blakely, Human Resources. Kathy eyes him, dubious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In going through your records, I see you've got quite a case load. It must be stressful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (deadpan) A bit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you say you're under extreme stress?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are concerns among some of your superiors that you've become impulsive, reckless in your position. Kathy sits, shocked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'd like to suggest taking some time off. You have some leave time... Kathy eyes him coolly. He slides over a booklet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See here? You can consolidate your leave. We'll contact our head offices in the U.K. and ensure none of your pay would be deducted... Just... Take a little vacation. Go home. See your kids. We're simply suggesting this out of concern for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you suggesting I take time off. Or are you telling me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is simply out of concern for you. Kathy pushes her chair back, and leaves. 150   INT. LIVING ROOM - KATHY'S APARTMENT - NIGHT                  150 Kathy sits at the table, covered in photos of girls, flipping through the Dyncorp manual, irritated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Consolidate my leave... A fucking vacation? She shakes her head, overwrought. Flipping through the manual, seeing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are these people? (stopping on a page) And why does Dyncorp, a company that sends American peacekeepers, have it's corporate headquarters in England? She looks up at Jan. He shrugs, sympathetic, wanting to help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course I want to see my kids, of course. But... not like this. Not by being sent home like some hysterical woman... My God, it wasn't that easy to up and leave them. If I go home like this... It's like coming here, this whole thing was a... mistake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . She shakes her head, lost in thought... Maybe it was... Jan sits beside her, concerned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nobody who knows you could think that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really? I'm losing witnesses, suspects... It's one step forward, two steps back... Jan tries to jump in. But--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, seriously. I'm just a cop from Nebraska. What do I know? Jan shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not what. It's who. You know them. He points at the files and photos of girls splayed all over the table. Kathy eyes them, torn between self-doubt and something much more instinctive... 151   INT. LAURA LEVIN'S OFFICE - GDA BOSNIA - EVENING              151 Laura sits across from Halyna, who is heartbroken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mrs. Kochan... It's been a few weeks now. I don't know if there's much point--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But we-- I must-- I have to do something. There has to be something I can do?! Laura takes a second. Suddenly struck with an idea. 152   EXT. OASIS BAR - MORNING                                      152 A large WOOD HOUSE with a neon CAMEL sits in the mountains above the city of TUZLA. A VAN pulls up. 153   INT. OASIS BAR - MOMENTS LATER                                153 Raya, Luba follow Ivan up stairs. Ivan unlocks a BACK BEDROOM He bangs on a wall. FIVE GIRLS wake in cots on the ground. He motions for them to go in. They do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MARA, 19, hands Raya and Luba a piece of paper with CRUDE DRAWINGS of SEXUAL POSITIONS. A price value by each.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You work in two hours. Ivan and Mara leave, locking the door behind him. The other girls go about their business, barely noticing Raya and Luba. But JULIA and TANYA, 16, come over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You sleep on whichever mattresses are available. The last two girls in have to share.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They bring us food in the morning. You have to eat it all, or you get fined. Raya grabs her head. Feeling faint. She looks for a place to sit. Julia and Tanya help her to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't let him see you like this. Luba walks over to the other side of the room. Finds a spot and sits. Raya watches her, hurt. Julia pushes a mattress aside. Underneath is a... COUNTING SYSTEM scratched into the floor. Each girls' name scratched with numbers beside it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm the closest. Then I can go home. Raya barely has the energy to hold herself up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's your name?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rayisa...Raya Kochan. Tanya scratches Raya's name into the floor. Then one mark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's all bullshit--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! He sent a girl back three months ago. I was here! (to Luba) What is your name? Raya eyes Luba who's conflicted between loyalty to her friend and her own sense of survival. Luba tears up, but turns away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (softly) Her name is Luba. Luba Pankiw. 154   INT. KATHY'S OFFICE - UNMHQ - MORNING                         154 Kathy works, angry, urgent now. On her desk... CLOSER: REPORT: PHOTO ID LINE-UP. Kathy matches circled ID photos of IPTF alongside testimony and Polaroids of girls. She works fast. Circling the photos, slapping files closed. When a... MAIL BOY slides in a cart, and places a stack of REPORTS on Kathy's IN-BOX. She pulls the first one off the top... A sticky note on the first page: Insufficient Evidence. Kathy grabs another... Sticky note: Unreliable Witness. She sees the name NADIA at the top of the statement. She grabs... ANOTHER: Unreliable Witness. And another... Transferred to Internal Affairs. Kathy flies through the rest of the files. One after another: Insufficient Evidence -- Insufficient Evidence -- Transferred to Internal Affairs --Unreliable Witnesses -- Insufficient -- A photo falls out of one of them: RAYA. Kathy stares at it. Her eyes wander over the room, and fall on her predecessor's battered old file boxes, still waiting for Archives. She moves to them. Cuts the string on the top box. Rips the top off. Inside... REPORT FILES. Slotted in tight. She grabs one. STICKY NOTE: Insufficient Evidence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus. She starts RIPPING through them all -- YELLOW STICKY NOTES on all of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kath... It's Jim Higgins, out of breath, in the doorway...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They've called an assembly for all Dyncorp personnel. 155   INT. CONFERENCE ROOM - UNMHQ - NIGHT                         155 Kathy and Jim walk into a room filled with DYNCORP BOYS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anyone know what this is about? No one does. Kathy sits amongst the guys. Until... Rick walks up to the front.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have some not so pleasant news, but bear with me. (Off a prepared statement) Lately, local police have raided some houses of `ill repute' and a number of `ladies of the evening' have been taken into custody. While the credibility of these witnesses is questionable, apparently photo line-ups have been made available to them. Rick eyes Kathy, pointedly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This issue is currently receiving a lot of attention. Guys, you gotta be careful... Kathryn Bolkovac is heading up this investigation. If you have any questions refer them to her. ALL EYES ON KATHY. They disperse, passing her, camaraderie obliterated. Kathy walks, livid...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've given every officer time to create an alibi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not going to subject my men to this witch hunt based on the testimony of some hookers! Prostitution is illegal! Your witnesses are criminals. Kathy can't believe what he's saying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They are SLAVES. By any American or International law.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These slaves are lying about their presence in Bosnia. You are coming after American Officers with baseless claims.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...you know they're not baseless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you've got a problem, go call the Ambassador's wife. 156   INT./EXT. LOBBY - UNMHQ - EVENING                           156 ELEVATOR DOORS OPEN. Kathy comes out. Seeing... IPTF OFFICERS. All eyeing her. She hurries through them. 157   INT. KATHY'S APARTMENT - NIGHT                              157 Kathy sits, anxious. Jan touches her back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They hired you to do a job they don't want done. It's a P.R. position. She turns to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rick publicly outed me, jeopardizing those girls. I have to go over his head. But I... I never thought I'd have to go into Internal Affairs. The guys back home would never understand this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I understand you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah? And how long do you plan on being around, because the last two guys who said that aren't here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's just I waited so long you know. I want my kids to know I did something, to be proud.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Your kids are proud. You go on this mission and you're a big hero. I go and I'm a bad mother... (tearing up) I can't believe I'm gonna disappoint them again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So don't. He comes closer. She looks up. Decided. 158   INT./EXT. CAR - PARKING LOT - UNMHQ - EARLY MORNING        158 A blast of light through Kathy's windshield. The lot is empty. She looks at a PILE OF REPORTS on the passenger seat. 159   INT. LONG CORRIDOR - UNMHQ - MORNING                       159 Kathy, reports in hand, turns a corner, and... bumps into an OFFICER. She drops some files. He moves around her, as she bends to pick them up. She walks the rest of the hall, focused, and stops at a brass plaque: INTERNAL AFFAIRS. 160   INT. OFFICE - INTERNAL AFFAIRS - UNHMQ - MORNING           160 Kathy marches in, nervous... MONITORS turn and see her, knowing who she is, but trying not to show it. She approaches a MALE MONITOR at a desk in the front.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What can I do for you? The Monitor keeps typing as she talks. Kathy hesitates, then
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's, I need to speak in-camera with a senior IA official. I don't have a name, but-- Kathy recognizes Peter Ward working in a back OFFICE. He sees her, then closes the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just a moment please. 161   INT. CLOSED OFFICE - INTERNAL AFFAIRS - UNMHQ - DAY        161 Kathy sits across from an IA OFFICIAL, 50s. He skims through the reports, nodding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I did a photo ID line-up with victims who testified to international patronizing of brothels, as well as complicity in trafficking itself. He looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All the cases I filed to my superiors have come back, shut down. Some of them were marked as referred to IA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I haven't seen those.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really? He shakes his head, standing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's possible they're still in the pipeline, in preliminary processing. I'm sorry to have to rush this, but I have to get to a meeting. Thanks for coming in. He hands her a form.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You need to sign here, that you're asking for these investigations. 162   EXT. HILLS - NIGHT                                          162 Kathy jogs along a ridge, with a view high over Sarajevo. Determined, panting... she pushes past her fatigue. 163   INT. KATHY'S APARMENT - SHORT TIME LATER                    163 Kathy comes in, soaked in sweat. The PHONE RINGS. She rushes to it. CALLER ID: Unknown Number. She picks up, breathless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello?... Sorry, who is this?... Just one second... She grabs a pen and pad. Writing: THE HOLIDAY INN. 513.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I get your name? Hello? Hello? She looks at the phone, spooked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 164   INT. LOBBY - HOLIDAY INN HOTEL - SARAJEVO - DAY               164 Kathy moves through the lobby, scanning the scene of liquid lunches and diplomats. She keeps her head low, focused ON THE ELEVATORS Ding. The doors open. Kathy steps in. As they close... TWO DIPLOMATS slip in. The elevator ascends. Kathy stares dead ahead. 165   INT. HALLWAY - HOLIDAY INN - MOMENTS LATER                    165 Kathy stands at door 513. She takes a moment, then knocks. 166   INT. HOTEL ROOM - HOLIDAY INN - MOMENTS LATER                 166 Kathy is led in by Peter Ward. She comes inside, tentative, unsure who she's dealing with. Peter smokes furiously, a burned-out mission lifer, who's bright, intelligent eyes betray a last spark of the idealism that brought him into this world. He seems nervous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was you today, in IA?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (nodding) Would you like a drink? Kathy eyes him, dubious. He pours her a drink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I saw your files... Kathy nods. Peter slaps down a file. Kathy looks at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your file.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't understand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're investigating you. Kathy stares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you get it? They're circling the wagons... What did he tell you? He hadn't seen anything from you until today.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . She nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bullshit. Top Level Dyncorp commanders are walking into IA and removing your files. I've been told to shut down all your investigations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?.. There has to be some sort of an international court or body that can turn this around--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The United Nations. You're here. Peter thinking about how to put this...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dyncorp's contract with the State Department in Bosnia alone is worth 52 million dollars. We're paid ninety, a hundred grand, right?. But it's a drop in the ocean compared to their profits. This is a global corporation, top five defense contractors in the states after Halliburton and KB&R. You think they're gonna let some sex scandal threaten that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want a scandal. I just want--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . It's designed that way. No oversight. No national or international accountability.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dyncorp's Headquarters are in England--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exactly. Nothing leads back to the State Department. That includes you... So if something were to happen to you it wouldn't even make the news at home... No one would ever know... Poof. You're gone. Kathy sits. Scared. Finally understanding the world she's in. O.S. VOICES. Kathy jolts. Peter moves to the door. THROUGH THE EYE-HOLE: A COUPLE checks in across the room. Peter turns back. Sees a panic-stricken Kathy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you're going to keep going, you've got to stay under the radar. Make copies of all your files, keep them under lock and key. Just... Be careful... And know who you're up against. 167   EXT. PARKING LOT - HOLIDAY INN HOTEL - SARAJEVO - DAY         167 Kathy. Unstrung. She crosses the labyrinth of WHITE SUVs. She looks up at the OSCE towers. Feeling watched. TWO SFOR SOLDIERS walk toward her. Eyeing her. She slips a car key between her fingers, arming herself. Watching them as... They pass. Kathy picks up her pace. Getting to... HER SUV. Her pulse RACING. PARANOID. She checks around... The lot is empty. Quiet. She is alone. 168   EXT. UNITED NATIONS MISSION HEADQUARTERS - DAY                168 A row of international flags flap in the wind. 169   INT. KATHY'S OFFICE - UNMHQ - SAME                            169 Kathy watches the flags. She shifts her gaze to the bulletin board. Eyeing the picture of Raya. Then... she moves to... THE FILE CABINET. She pulls out   EVERY FILE. Photocopies them. Then... Opens the bottom filing   cabinet -- pushes files to the front -- placing the copies   in the back. She steps away... Closes the Cabinet. And   locks it... Knowing she is operating outside of protocol now. 170   INT. BACK BEDROOM - OASIS BAR - EVENING                       170 Raya stares at herself in a mirror. Dressed as a whore. 171   INT. OASIS BAR - EVENING                                      171 It's more of a medium-sized hall. A bar, some tables and a few `home touches'. Maps of Yugoslavia. Pictures of Tito. And FULL OF IPTF. Raya walks through, ogled. She sees... Luba, sitting on Mara's lap. Surrounded by TEN IRISH SOLDIERS. The soldiers ply them with drinks, `winning' them with charm. Luba blends in with remarkable ease.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You feel like a party? RORY, Irish, grabs Raya's hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (forcing) Yes... of course. He leads her to the back of the bar. Raya looks to Luba, but realizes she is alone. They walk through a BACK DOOR into a ROOM FULL OF BEDS SEPARATED with CURTAINS. We barely make out the shapes of various soldiers with girls in each cubicle. All busy. Until A curtain opens... And Jim Higgins walks out. His rite of passage complete. Rory pulls Raya to the cubicle, as Julia comes out. 172   EXT. SARAJEVO AIRPORT - EVENING                              172 Halyna boards a plane with PASSENGERS, but without Raya. 173   INT. KATHY'S APARTMENT - NIGHT                               173 Kathy opens the door into the empty apartment, seeing a RAPIDLY BLINKING LIGHT on a digital display: 14 MESSAGES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Click. Click. Click. Each message a silence followed by a hang-up. Kathy stares at the blinking light as the clicks keep coming. CLICK, CLICK, CLICK... She rips the machine out of the wall. 174   INT. KATHY'S APARTMENT - LATER                               174 We hear a DIAL UP CONNECTION. Kathy's at her computer. She brings up a Yahoo! Search page. TYPES IN: RICK JONES 2103 Matches for Rick Jones. She types again. CLOSE ON: RICK JONES + COLORADO SPRINGS 482 Matches for Rick Jones + Colorado Springs She scans down the page. None of the matches work. She shakes her head, about to give up, when... Chief of Police R. Jones in $1,000,000 Law Suit A PICTURE of Rick Jones accompanies the article. CLOSE ON WORDS: Richard Jones Fired for Sexual Harassment
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 175   INT. KATHY'S APARTMENT - SHORT TIME LATER                     175 Kathy sits at the empty kitchen table looking at the picture of her kids. She holds her head in her hands. 176   EXT. AMERICAN APARTMENT COMPLEX - SARAJEVO SUBURBS - NIGHT    176 Distant music echoes through the night. VOICES of GUYS hanging out on their balconies. Kathy crosses the lot, cutting through the dark night fog. 177   INT./EXT. SUV/ROAD - NIGHT                                    177 Kathy drives. Wide awake. The only vehicle on the road. 178   EXT. ILIDZA STATION - NIGHT                                   178 Kathy sits in the SUV. Staring at the station. THROUGH THE WINDOW... Jan works the late shift alone. 179   INT. ILIDZA STATION - NIGHT                                   179 Jan and Kathy sit. Several empty coffee cups.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is... I can't believe your timing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a rotation. They're sending us back a month early. I tried to get an extension, but... Kathy just stares ahead. Silent... a long time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not even sure I'm staying. Jan sits back. Stunned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These guys... Jones is a sexual offender. Dyncorp hired him... These private militaries are a sham. There's no way around them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If that's what your instincts are telling you...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have children, I have to think about them...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 180   INT. OASIS BAR - LATE NIGHT                                  180 A big IPTF PARTY. AT THE BAR: Raya waits with an empty tray. Luba pulls out a heavy crate of bottles. She hurts her back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here, I'll help you. Luba slams two bottles on Raya's tray.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm fine. I earned this job.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was just trying to--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't. You'll get us in trouble. An IPTF OFFICER, MIKE SEARS grabs Raya from behind. Shakes her, jokingly. She laughs, familiar. Almost routine..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How's my favorite girl?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am good. Everything good. She smiles, hollow and takes the tray over to a TABLE. Julia and Tanya sit with FOUR MEN in suits. They're plastered.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wanna party all night. The girls smile, nodding, playing along...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go out. I wanna take you home. He squeezes Tanya tight to him, kissing her sloppily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ivan! C'mere! Raya eyes Julia. Ivan comes over, smiling, a gregarious host.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We wanna party on mate. How much to take them home for the day? Ivan eyes the girls. Thinking...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ten times normal. Pay upfront. And extra deposit. But you cannot take her. He points at Raya.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three thousand each. (off their scoffing) You bring back, you get back deposit. Ivan smiles. The other two men are dubious. But Suit 1 and Suit 2 exchange glances... Daring each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're on. Ivan waves to follow him. They walk with Julia and Tanya. Raya watches Ivan throw in a bottle of whiskey. They pay him. Julia catches Raya's eye. They exchange...
